description: Pilates is an exercise program designed to stretch, strengthen, and balance the body. The poses are systematic and utilise specific breathing techniques that make them extremely effective in encouraging muscle strength and tone. Pilates has been used extensively by dancers and sports professional but is also suitable for persons interested in improving overall fitness. Benefits from practicing Pilates include: increased lung capacity, flexibility, improved posture and balance, back strength and muscular definition particularly in the abdominal region. With Jillian Hessel and Ana Caban, this video is divided into three sections. Part one: using a chair this section focuses on alignment, light stretching for the upper body, and deep and percussive breathing, essential to an effective Pilates workout, that helps flatten the abdomen, lengthen the spine and support the lower back. Part two: mat workout designed to be practiced in the morning, aims to awaken and enliven mind and body. These poses, seated and upright, improve abdominal strength, alignment, posture and overall muscle tone. Part three: designed to be practised in the afternoon or early evening, this component encourages the user to wind down physically and emotionally, whilst providing a physically demanding work out. Includes breathing techniques, vigorous exercises and concludes with calming poses. All three workouts are narrated with detailed instructions. To reduce the risk of injury, consult your doctor before beginning this or any exercise program.
